comment:
* Contains utility methods for Framework implementation of AppSearch.
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public File getAppSearchDir(@NonNull Context unused, @NonNull UserHandle userHandle)
methods.comment:
* Returns AppSearch directory in the credential encrypted system directory for the given user. * *

This folder should only be accessed after unlock.

methods.name: public Context createContextAsUser(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull UserHandle userHandle)
methods.comment: Creates context for the user based on the userHandle.

methods.name: public ExecutorService createExecutorService(int corePoolSize, int maxConcurrency, long keepAliveTime, TimeUnit unit, BlockingQueue<Runnable> workQueue, int priority)
methods.comment: Creates and returns a ThreadPoolExecutor for given parameters.

methods.name: public ExecutorService createSingleThreadExecutor()
methods.comment: Createsand returns an ExecutorService with a single thread.

methods.name: public File getCacheDir(@NonNull Context context)
methods.comment: * Returns a cache directory for creating temporary files like in case of migrating documents.

methods.name: public int getInvalidUid()
methods.comment: Returns an INVALID UID, this is duplicated to maintain code-sync with GMSCore.

methods.name: public ExecutorService createCachedThreadPoolExecutor()
methods.comment: Creates and returns an Executor with cached thread pools.

methods.name: public boolean isInfoLoggingEnabled()
methods.comment: Returns if we can log INFO level logs.

methodNames: public File getAppSearchDir(@NonNull Context unused, @NonNull UserHandle userHandle)
public Context createContextAsUser(@NonNull Context context, @NonNull UserHandle userHandle)
public ExecutorService createExecutorService(int corePoolSize, int maxConcurrency, long keepAliveTime, TimeUnit unit, BlockingQueue<Runnable> workQueue, int priority)
